full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I DPAL GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS LA SKYES RABS KYI SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA BZHUGS, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,CES THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I DPAL GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS LA SKYES PA'I RABS KYI SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I RIM PA 'DI YANG, BSTAN PA'I RTZA LAG DAM PA GLING SMAD CHOS KYI RJE DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BTZUN @003B PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ` ,,BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DBANG GI RGYAL PO LTAR, ,SNYAN GRAGS TSANGS DBYANGS SRID PA GSUM NA 'KHROL, ,'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO'I GOS CAN KHYAB MDZAD PA'I, ,RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I ZHABS LA GSOL 'DEBS LAS PHYUNG NGO,, ` BLO BZANG CHOS TSUL KUN GSAL YANGS PA'I NGOS, ,RNAM 'BYED RTA BDUN DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS SHAR BAS, , SNYIGS DUS RGUD MUN MTHAR MDZAD CHOS KYI RJE, ,BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I 'DREN PAR GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DU GYUR BA'I SKYES MCHOG DAM PA T'A KOO SHR'I LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE'I BZHED PA SKONG PHYIR SBYAR BA'O,, RJE 'DI NYID KYI GSUNG NGO,,
